sentences.sContent: However , the five basic principles set up here on the basis of the theory of information equivalence , are available for translating English malapropism .
sentences.sContent_eng: However , the five basic principles set up here on the basis of the theory of information equivalence , are available for translating English malapropism .
sentences.sCn: 然而，如果以信息等效理论为基础，我们仍然能提出一些适用于英语误用词翻译的基本原则。

trans.tranCn: 词语误用, 用词错误可笑
trans.tranOther: an amusing mistake that you make when you use a word that sounds similar to the word you intended to say but means something completely different
